content: drops halloween knitted pumpkin in nepal pattern no ne-203 yarn group c or a + a measurements small pumpkin filled circumference approx 34 cm/13½ height approx 5 5 cm/2¼ without stem large pumpkin filled circumference approx 48 cm/19 height approx 8 cm/3 without stem materials drops nepal from garnstudio for both pumpkins 100 g color no 2920 orange 50 g color no 2923 goldenrod 50 g color no 7238 olive drops straight needles size 5 mm/us 8 or size needed to get 17 sts x 33 row in garter st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm accessories some poly stuffing for filling
